channel.title: Fundamental Analysis on Learn with AI
channel.description: Recent content in Fundamental Analysis on Learn with AI

item.description: 習題預習 User ask: 給我5題Financial Statements的問題 ChatGPT answer: What are the main components of a company’s income statement, and how are they calculated? How does a company’s balance sheet provide insight into its financial health, and what information can be gleaned from the key sections of this statement? How does the statement of cash flows differ from other financial statements, and what key metrics does it provide for assessing a company’s liquidity?

習題預習 User ask: 給我5題Industry Analysis的問題 ChatGPT answer: What are the current trends and developments in the industry, and how are they affecting businesses in the market? Who are the leading competitors in the industry and what are their strengths and weaknesses? What are the barriers to entry in the industry, and how are they impacting new entrants? What are the key success factors in the industry, and how do businesses in the market achieve these factors?

習題預習 User ask: 給我5題Ratios的問題 ChatGPT answer: If a recipe calls for a ratio of 2 cups of flour to 1 cup of milk, how many cups of milk should be used if 4 cups of flour are used? A painting is 5 inches by 7 inches. What is the ratio of the length to the width? A rectangle has a length of 10 feet and a width of 5 feet. What is the ratio of the length to the perimeter?
